title: Mobile-Based Collaborative-Competitive Game Learning Program for Improving College Students' Sleep Hygiene

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A project-based course for math majors investigating the impact of improved sleep quality on academic performance. Motivation is enhanced through real-time data collection using smartphone sensors and team-based competitive elements

learning_goals: Learners can maintain an average sleep duration of seven hours or more by the end of the four-week program.
Learners can establish and implement personalized sleep plans through sleep cycle monitoring.
Learners can analyze data acquired from team-based mobile games and write a report explaining the correlation between sleep patterns and academic performance.

resources: Gamification Platform Integration System within LMS
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
